attributes.action: Cameron said Article 50 would be invoked the following day if vote leave won!
attributes.additional_details:
The ballot paper stated REMAIN OR LEAVE as choices. Majority voted LEAVE

LEAVE MEANS OUT-not part in and out and negotiations to delay getting out.  All I have seen is delay tactics since the 24 06 16

No more uncontrolled immigration, tax payers money going on economic migrants.  I want an Australian points system for immigration.  I do not want to become a minority in my own country due to mass immigration. No more tax payers money going to the EU, or being ruled by a foreign power-UK LAW
attributes.background:
The EU leaflet wrongfully paid for by the tax payer stated the following:

The referendum on Thursday, 23rd June is your chance to decide if we should remain in or leave the European Union.

This is your decision. The Government will implement what you decide.
